name: Super Arena
description:
Welcome to the Super Arena! This is a small project that I made during the RPG Maker MV Free Weekend. It's not very balanced and probably has a lot of issues, but I can fix all of them in the future. I don't have the money for a full licence to the tool right now, but when I get one I will complete this!

But enough about me, what about you? Are you tired of playing RPG Maker games with "parties" and "storylines" and "in-depth characters?" Well look no further! Introducing Super Arena, the place where heroes go to gain great wealth, or die in the process. With a huge variance in the enemy types and powers, you'll have to constantly change tactics if you ever want to survive in...

THE SUPER ARENA!
